examples: My long life as a refugee has taught me tolerance.
Mi larga vida como refugiada me ha enseñado la tolerancia.
Refugee status is a humanitarian shelter.
El estatus de refugiado es un refugio humanitario.
Every refugee's case is a story of ...
El caso de cada refugiado es una historia de ...
A refugee without passport has lost his membership in ...
Un refugiado sin pasaporte ha perdido su membresía en ...
